interactions.text: I'm feeling really stressed about my upcoming presentation at work.
interactions.suggestion: Try taking a few deep breaths. Research shows that just 2 minutes of deep breathing can significantly reduce stress hormones. Would you like me to guide you through a quick breathing exercise?

feedback.text: This helped me calm down a bit

interactions.text: I just finished my presentation and it went really well! My boss even complimented me!
interactions.suggestion: That's fantastic news! Your preparation clearly paid off. Would you like to celebrate this win by doing something you enjoy this evening?

feedback.text: Great suggestion, I'll treat myself to a nice dinner

interactions.text: I didn't sleep well last night. I'm feeling so tired today.
interactions.suggestion: I'm sorry to hear that. Poor sleep can definitely affect your energy levels. While caffeine might help temporarily, consider taking a short 20-minute power nap during lunch if possible. Would you like some tips for better sleep tonight?

interactions.text: I just got into an argument with my partner. I don't know what to do.
interactions.suggestion: I understand this is difficult. Arguments happen in all relationships. Once you both have cooled down, consider having an open conversation focusing on 'I feel' statements rather than blame. Would it help to talk through some communication strategies?

feedback.text: Thanks for the advice, I think we just need some time

interactions.text: We talked things through and made up. I feel so much better now!
interactions.suggestion: I'm happy to hear that! Resolving conflicts in a healthy way is a sign of a strong relationship. This experience might even make your bond stronger. Is there anything specific from the conversation you'd like to reflect on?

feedback.text: Your previous advice really helped with our conversation

interactions.text: 我即将参加一个重要的演讲比赛，需要做好准备
interactions.suggestion: 提前准备并进行多次练习会增强你的信心和表现

feedback.text: 这个建议很有帮助，但我还需要更多具体的演讲技巧

emotion_history.context: 我即将参加一个重要的演讲比赛，需要做好准备

interactions.text: I just got a promotion at work! I'm so excited!
interactions.suggestion: Congratulations on your promotion! This is a significant achievement and reflects all your hard work. How do you plan to celebrate this milestone?

interactions.text: I'm feeling nervous about starting my new role next week.
interactions.suggestion: It's completely natural to feel nervous about a new role. Remember, they promoted you because they believe in your abilities. Would it help to make a list of your strengths and achievements to boost your confidence?

feedback.text: That's a good idea, I'll try making that list

interactions.text: I'm attending a workshop on leadership skills today. Hope it goes well!
interactions.suggestion: That sounds like a valuable opportunity! Leadership workshops can provide both practical skills and networking opportunities. Consider setting specific goals for what you'd like to learn or achieve from the workshop.
